Package org.exoplatform.social.client.api

Interface Summary
ClientServiceFactory The main entry point to get eXo Social Services.
 

Class Summary
SocialClientContext The client context to hold states of: host, port, portalContainerName, restContextName and rest version and auth schema.
 

Enum Summary
SocialClientContext.SupportedVersion The enum for supported Social Rest APIs versions.
 

Exception Summary
SocialClientLibException  
UnsupportedMethodException Exception when one method is called but it is not implemented or supported yet.
UnsupportedRestVersionException Exception for the case that the client wants to use the rest version is not supported.
